statement.p: In 30.23 of the last 43 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{43}}={0.3023}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{43}. \displaystyle{P}={0.3023}\cdot{43}={12.9989}. This is the number of days that it rained. We want the non-rainy days which is 43-12.9989=30.0011 We round that as requested to 30.
